• Established and documented standard operating procedures for two skincare companies.• Collaborated with upper management and front-line sales to achieve marketing, production, delivery, and growth goals. • Processed POs, return authorizations, invoices, special orders, marketing programs, promotions, and all other sales transactions for retail, wholesale, and physician accounts. • Provided superior customer service and sales rep support as a member of the Account Concierge team.• Provided office management services, including, but not limited to, scheduling meetings, ordering office supplies, organizing and documenting in-house inventory, and coordinating philanthropic quarterly donations and activities.

I am a goal oriented self-starter who works effectively with a team or as an individual with internal and external customers. I am highly motivated, intelligent, and always up for a challenge.
